ValidationRule.description: Asserts approval matrix for Customer Service records
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(TEXT(Department__c ) = 'CS', TEXT(Approval_Status__c) = 'Approved', OR ( NOT ( OR ($Permission.CS_Sr_Associate, $Permission.CS_Team_Lead, $Permission.CS_Sr_Team_Lead, $Permission.CS_Manager )), AND (Amount_Waived__c > 1000, NOT ( OR ($Permission.CS_Team_Lead, $Permission.CS_Sr_Team_Lead, $Permission.CS_Manager ))), AND (Amount_Waived__c > 25000, NOT ( $Permission.CS_Manager )), Amount_Waived__c > 100000 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have permission to approve this request.
